translation.en: Oh, it's so cold.
It's like a thousand needles poking into you.
It finally feels like Christmas.
I can't believe you grew up with this. Is this Philly or the ice planet Hoth? [laughs]
translation.de: In der Kälte wuchst du auf? Ist das Philly oder der Eisplanet Hoth?

translation.en: Yeah, listen.
Uh, when you first meet my dad, maybe cool it with the Star Wars talk.
translation.de: Wenn du auf Dad triffst, lass das Gerede über Star Wars.

translation.en: Just until he gets to know you. And then...
translation.de: Nur bis er dich kennt. Und...

translation.en: -I don't know, maybe also after. -Aww.
You're so cute when you're trying to hide who I am.
translation.de: Du bist so süß, wenn du mich verleugnest.

translation.en: Emmy, I got this.
I know. Just... I want him to love you as much as I love you.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Aber er soll dich so lieben wie ich dich.

translation.en: Okay. Well, my dad said he'd be here at 8:45, and it's 8:40...
translation.de: Dad sagte, er sei 8 Uhr 45 hier, und es ist 8 Uhr fünfund...

translation.en: ...five.
-Hey, Dad! Merry almost-Christmas! -Mmm.
translation.de: Hey, Dad. Schon mal frohe Weihnachten.

translation.en: Welcome home, sweetie!
This must be Matt.
Good to finally meet you in person. [chuckles] How was the flight?
translation.de: Schön, dich persönlich kennenzulernen. Wie war der Flug?

translation.en: Ah, you know, red-eyes are tough. Always hard to get much sleep.
translation.de: Nachtflüge sind hart. Man schläft kaum.

translation.en: I can sleep anywhere.
I trained my body to sleep through air strikes when I led a platoon in Desert Storm.
translation.de: Ich lernte, bei Luftangriffen zu schlafen, als ich Einheiten im Golfkrieg anführte.

translation.en: Wow. I just... take half an Ambien and drink red wine. Your thing's cooler.
translation.de: Wow. Ich nehme eine halbe Schlaftablette und trinke Rotwein. Sie sind cooler.

translation.en: Mixing drugs and alcohol.
Interesting.
Okay! Here we go. [claps hands] Let's...
-All right. -Yeah.
[Don] Oh, you got your ax.
So, how's your band? -Had any gigs? -[coughs] Oh.
translation.de: Wie geht's der Band? Hattet ihr Auftritte?

translation.en: A few. Mostly still paying our dues.
translation.de: Ein paar. Wir müssen uns den Erfolg noch verdienen.

translation.en: Paying dues, not rent, huh?
[chuckles] Just kidding ya.
Good one. [chuckles]
Oh, look at me, back of a cop car. It's like I'm a perp, you know, and you're the-- Oh!
translation.de: Sieh an, ich hinten im Polizeiwagen. Als wäre ich ein Täter und Sie...

translation.en: I feel like a bad boy back here.
translation.de: Ich fühle mich wie ein Verbrecher.

translation.en: Oh, dang it. I left my mittens on the plane.
translation.de: Mist. Ich ließ die Fäustlinge im Flieger.

translation.en: Hey, Em. You remember my buddy, Ted Boseman?
translation.de: Hey, Em. Kennst du noch meinen Kumpel Ted Boseman?

translation.en: -No. -Oh, yeah you do.
Anyway, I ran into him at church last Sunday,
translation.de: Jedenfalls traf ich ihn am Sonntag in der Kirche.

translation.en: and it turns out he's kind of a big deal here at D&P Financial.
translation.de: Es stellt sich heraus, er ist ein großes Tier bei D&P Financial.

translation.en: And he wants to chat with you about opportunities right here in Philly.
translation.de: Und er will mit dir über Möglichkeiten hier in Philly reden.

translation.en: -Oh. -What, you mean like her move back here?
Seat belt, please.
Dad, I already have a finance job in LA, where I live with the guy that I love.
translation.de: Ich habe schon einen Finanz-Job in LA, wo ich mit dem Mann lebe, den ich liebe.

translation.en: -How are you doing back there, sweetie? -Bulletproof glass is hard.
translation.de: -Wie geht's dir da hinten? -Kugelsicheres Glas ist hart.

translation.en: Yeah, forget I mentioned it.
But, uh...
Ah, keep it in mind. [chuckles]
Got the Christmas lights out, ready to go.
Love it. Love it. [chuckles]
We put our lights up today, and we take them down on New Year's Day.
translation.de: Wir bringen heute die Lichter an und nehmen sie am Neujahrstag ab.

translation.en: Emmy's mom, she had a rule.
Ten days, that's it. This ain't Las Vegas.
translation.de: Nur zehn Tage. Wir sind nicht in Las Vegas.

translation.en: Everybody's coming over tonight for the Quinn family house lighting.
translation.de: Heute kommt die Familie zur Festtagsbeleuchtung der Quinns.

translation.en: Tradition's my dad's favorite thing.
Right up there with Law & Order. [chuckles] The show and the thing.
translation.de: Das und Law & Order. Die Serie und das, wofür sie steht.

translation.en: Our house lighting, tree trimming, caroling, midnight mass,
translation.de: Unsere Hausbeleuchtung, Baumschmuck, Weihnachtslieder, die Messe,

translation.en: Christmas brunch, Christmas dinner, a sensible New Year's Eve celebration.
The world might change...
The Quinns...
never will.
Remember when you asked why I moved across the country?
translation.de: Du wolltest doch wissen, warum ich weit wegzog.

translation.en: Here it is!
The house that made all this.
translation.de: Das Haus, das mich zu der hier machte.

translation.en: This is nice.
I want the full tour, -but can I take a quick nap? -Yeah.
translation.de: Zeig mir alles, aber kann ich kurz schlafen?

translation.en: I just want to be on my game when I meet the--
Oh, my God!
[gasps] The prodigal sister returns. Give me hugs, come here! I want them! Oh!
translation.de: Die verlorene Schwester kehrt zurück. Lass dich drücken!

translation.en: Matt, this is my sister Patsy and her husband Todd.
translation.de: Matt, das sind meine Schwester Patsy und ihr Mann Todd.

translation.en: Mr. Rock 'n' Roller. Coming in for a hug. I'm a hugger. Okay. [squeals]
translation.de: Mr. Rockstar. Achtung, Umarmung. Das ist mein Ding. Ok?

translation.en: -Thanks for coming over to welcome us. -Oh, your dad said we had to.
translation.de: -Schön, dass ihr Hallo sagt. -Euer Dad wollte das.

translation.en: [clears throat] And I said, "Heck, I want to."
So, who's hungry? I'm making eggies like Mom used to make.
translation.de: Hungrig? Ich mache Eggies, wie Mom früher.

translation.en: Not as good, obviously. But not bad, if I do say so myself.
translation.de: Nicht so gut. Aber auch nicht schlecht, wenn ich das sagen darf.

translation.en: And I do!
Please have an eggie.
-We arrested a mall Santa last night. -[Emmy] Mm.
He lost a toe breaking into Victoria's Secret.
translation.de: Er verlor eine Zehe, als er im Wäscheshop einbrach.

translation.en: Nancy, the nurse at the hospital, she says,
translation.de: Schwester Nancy aus dem Krankenhaus sagte:

translation.en: "Somebody just made his own naughty list."
She's a hoot.
Oh. Well, there'll be coal in his lace stocking, huh?
translation.de: Der wird wohl eine dicke Rute kriegen.

translation.en: Want to go get some sleep, Matt?
I really do.
-Well, look who's here from Hollyweird. -Hi!
translation.de: Na, wer kommt denn da aus Hollyweird?

translation.en: Oh. Matt, this is my brother Sean, his wife Joy.
translation.de: Matt, mein Bruder Sean und seine Frau Joy.

translation.en: There'll be a test on these names later.
Not really.
My name's easy. You look at me, what do you see?
translation.de: Mein Name ist leicht zu merken. Wie seh ich aus?

translation.en: Joy. Donny, stop playing with the knives.
translation.de: Joy. Donny, spiel nicht mit den Messern.

translation.en: Sean Jr., you are getting so big. You look like you could be an Avenger.
translation.de: Sean Jr.? Du wirst immer größer. Du könntest ein Avenger sein.

translation.en: You don't need to do that.
Yeah! He's in a fun new phase.
So, Matt. LA boy. You a Rams fan?
translation.de: Also, Matt, Junge aus LA. Bist du Rams-Fan?

translation.en: Uh, I don't really like football.
I love it.
You know, Super Bowls, touchdowns, just all of it.
Tom Brady. I mean, he's one of 'em.
translation.de: Tom Brady. Der gehört auch dazu.

translation.en: [laughs] You got me. I was like, "Uh-oh, Em got a dud."
translation.de: Hast mich reingelegt. Dachte, Em hat 'nen Idioten erwischt.

translation.en: Pats, we doing eggies?
-Which way is the bathroom? -Right there.
You know, it's just-- It's pee.
He seems nice.
But is he worth staying in California, with all the earthquakes and the fires and Californians?
translation.de: Aber ist er's wert, sich in Kalifornien den Erdbeben und Bränden auszusetzen?

translation.en: [Alan] At least admit that it was inconsiderate.
translation.de: Gib zu, dass es unüberlegt war.

translation.en: [Kayla] Oh, my God. It's not that big of a deal, Alan.
translation.de: Oh, mein Gott. Es ist keine große Sache, Alan.

translation.en: I just wish you'd shown me the Christmas card before mailing them to everyone we know.
translation.de: Du hättest mir die Karten vor dem Versenden zeigen sollen.

translation.en: Great! You can be in charge next year.
translation.de: Toll! Du machst es nächstes Jahr.

translation.en: -Good! -Awesome!
-Fantastic! -Can you double-cheese that thing?
Hi, sis. Sorry we're late.
Someone only started caring about the Christmas cards after I mailed them out this morning.
translation.de: Jemand interessiert sich für die Karten, nachdem ich sie verschickte.

translation.en: Gosh, who could "someone" be?
How do we crack that code?
Who wants an eggie? Kayla, Alan? You want an eggie?
translation.de: Wer mag Eggies? Kayla, Alan? Eggie?

translation.en: -I want a divorce. -What?
-What? -What?
Okay, I'm sorry I didn't show you the cards.
translation.de: Sorry, dass ich dir die Karten nicht zeigte.

translation.en: Now, can we please move on?
No. I-I want a divorce.
I didn't mean for it to come out like this, but... [inhales deeply] ...you have to admit we're not happy.
translation.de: Ich wollte es nicht auf diese Weise sagen, aber gib zu, dass wir unglücklich sind.

translation.en: You're leaving me?
Now? Well, there's not really a good time.
Yes, there is.
When you die. That's when you leave, Alan.
translation.de: Wenn du stirbst. Dann gehst du, Alan.

translation.en: Till death do us part.
translation.de: Bis dass der Tod uns scheidet.

translation.en: Death, Alan, not Christmas.
Hey. Let me guess. Kayla and Alan.
translation.de: Hey. Lasst mich raten. Kayla und Alan.

translation.en: [chuckles] Patsy, I think I'm ready for that name test.
translation.de: Patsy, mach mit mir den Namenstest.

translation.en: We fight every day. We haven't had sex in a year!
translation.de: Wir streiten jeden Tag. Wir hatten ein Jahr keinen Sex.

translation.en: I can't believe you're talking about this in front of my entire family.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass du das vor meiner Familie sagst.

translation.en: And that guy.
You're with your entire family all the time.
translation.de: Deine Familie ist ständig um dich herum.

translation.en: Everything happens in front of them, and because of them.
translation.de: Alles passiert vor ihnen und wegen ihnen.

translation.en: We're the reason you're bailing on your marriage?
translation.de: Wir sind der Grund, dass du abhauen willst?

translation.en: We're the problem?
We're delightful.
We don't have kids.
So, yeah,
I think it's best to rip the Band-Aid off and move on.
translation.de: Machen wir's kurz und schmerzlos und trennen uns.

translation.en: And Don, did you just unsnap the holster of your service revolver?
translation.de: Don, hast du eben den Revolverholster geöffnet?

translation.en: If you want to leave, then go.
Now.
Back door, buddy.
Your mom's eggies?
Always too salty.
No wonder he didn't want our cards to go out.
translation.de: Darum war er gegen die Karten.

translation.en: "Happy Holidays from Kayla and Alan?"
It was a lie.
Honey, uh...
You put "Happy Holidays," not "Merry Christmas?"
He means that we love you
-and we're here for you. -Yes. Honey.
-Of course. -[Kayla] What am I gonna do?
translation.de: -und sind für dich da. -Ja. Natürlich. Und jetzt? Heute früh war noch alles ok.

translation.en: I woke up this morning and everything was fine, and now...
translation.de: Und jetzt? Heute früh war noch alles ok. Und jetzt...

translation.en: Now, I don't even want to go home.
translation.de: Ich will nicht mal nach Hause.

translation.en: But you could stay here.
As long as you want. This will always be your home.
translation.de: So lange du willst. Das bleibt dein Zuhause!

translation.en: [Emmy] Yeah.
And I'll be here.
[Patsy] Ooh, it'll be just like the old days.
I'm sorry, Mom.
A Quinn getting divorced.
I don't know what happened.
Well? Hug me!
Oh, Jesus!
Sorry.
-What are you guys doing? -Nothing.
Just... this eggnog went bad.
Yeah, it's just a bad... -nog situation. -[Matt] Oh.
translation.de: Ja, ein Fall... voll ranzigem Punsch.

translation.en: Looked like you were pouring one out to someone.
[laughs] No. No.
No.
I feel so bad for Kayla.
Yeah.
But...
you know...
Two sides to every story.
Alan has his issues, but Kayla can be a bit of a--
translation.de: Alan hat Probleme, aber Kayla kann ziemlich...

translation.en: -Pill. -A big pill.
-Yeah. -Oh. Wow. Okay.
You know, I-I like getting the in-laws take on this stuff,
translation.de: Mich interessiert die Meinung der Angeheirateten.

translation.en: 'cause I'm hoping to be one of you guys soon.
translation.de: Ich will einer von euch sein.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Emmy to marry me. Christmas morning.
translation.de: Ich will Emmy einen Antrag machen. Am Weihnachtsmorgen.

translation.en: We need to tell him.
-No, we can't trust him. -He needs to know.
translation.de: -Wir können ihm nicht trauen. -Er muss es wissen.

translation.en: Obviously, I can hear you.
Okay, look. Emmy's great. You guys should totally get married.
translation.de: Ok, hör zu. Emmy ist toll. Ihr solltet heiraten.

translation.en: Just do it far away from here.
LA's good. Hawaii's better.
translation.de: LA ist gut. Hawaii ist besser.

translation.en: Guam is still America.
-[Kayla] I don't know what happened. -B-B-Be cool.
-[Patsy] We're here for you. -[Don] Of course.
We were pouring one out.
To Alan. We have a sort of support group.
translation.de: Es galt Alan. Wir haben eine Selbsthilfegruppe.

translation.en: Support group for what?
The people who married into this family.
The Quinns are great.
But when they're together, which is almost every day...
translation.de: Aber sind sie zusammen, also fast täglich...

translation.en: Pizza Fridays, Sunday brunches, pop-ins, stop-bys, meetups, hangouts.
Don has a saying: "There's the Quinn way and the wrong way."
translation.de: Dons Motto lautet: "Nur Quinns liegen richtig."

translation.en: How to spend your money. How to vote. Where to vacation.
translation.de: In Bezug auf Geldausgaben. Wahlen. Ferienorte.

translation.en: -What kind of soda to drink. -Pepsi.
It's always got to be Pepsi.
And our spouses think the Quinn way is normal.
translation.de: Unsere Ehepartner denken, sie seien normal.

translation.en: But it's like a cult. A G-rated cult.
translation.de: Aber es ist wie ein Kult. Ein jugendfreier Kult.

translation.en: We secretly meet at this bar, Otto's. Just to talk stuff out.
translation.de: Wir treffen uns heimlich im Otto's. Um zu reden.

translation.en: And the family will never catch us there because Quinns don't drink.
translation.de: Die Familie merkt das nie. Quinns trinken nicht.

translation.en: Don says alcohol is a crutch, which I guess is true, but also, you know, shut up. [chuckles]
translation.de: Don sagt, Alkohol sei eine Krücke, was wohl stimmt, aber... scheißegal.

translation.en: We, uh, call ourselves the Outlaw In-laws.
-No, we don't. Todd does. -It's good.
Outlaw In-laws! [laughs]
Thanks. But Emmy's not like that at all.
translation.de: Hört zu, danke. Aber Emmy ist nicht so. Sie trinkt Coca Cola und Alkohol.

translation.en: She drinks Coke and alcohol.
translation.de: Aber Emmy ist nicht so. Sie trinkt Coca Cola und Alkohol.

translation.en: That's because she's been away.
But in the four or five days you're here, she'll get sucked back in.
translation.de: Nach 4, 5 Tagen wird sie wieder reingesogen.

translation.en: We're here for ten days.
-Oh, Lord. -Oh, you poor bastard.
-[strumming] -Hey.
I'm so glad you're here.
Me too.
How do you think I'm doing so far?
Great. In fact, you'd better pace yourself with all that charm.
translation.de: Toll. Halte dich besser mit deinem Charme zurück.

translation.en: We still got a lot of trip left.
Oh, well, I have a lot of charm left. -With razzle-dazzle to spare. -[laughs]
translation.de: Ich habe noch viel Charme übrig. Und sogar etwas Liebreiz.

translation.en: [chuckles] Can I take a nap now?
-[Kayla] Oh, look. -Oh!
The lovebirds.
How you feelin'?
Sad. [exhales]
Angry.
Confused.
A little hungry.
Well, how about a little food for the soul?
Any requests?
Do you know the song "Not Now" by you?
So, Matt. Kayla and I shared this room when we were kids.
translation.de: Also... Matt. Kayla und ich teilten uns früher dieses Zimmer.

translation.en: -Yeah. Now it's her and you. -Yeah.
I just keep getting cut out of people's lives.
Oh, well...
Do you want to stay in here with me tonight?
Matt could take the spare room. Right, Matt?
Oh, yes. That would make me feel so much better.
-Oh, good. -Thank you.
Oh, you want me to go now?
-Mm-hmm. -[softly] Thank you.
Man, puberty hit the Keller kids hard.
-Hey, can I talk to you guys? -Sure, sweetie.
Oh, a sit-down talk.
You're not pregnant, are you?
So... [exhales]
I know you've been wondering why I've been all, like, quiet lately.
translation.de: Ihr habt euch sicher gefragt, warum ich so ruhig bin in letzter Zeit.

translation.en: [exhales] I've been trying to figure out how to tell you.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, wie ich's euch sage.

translation.en: I, um...
I have these feelings.
In me.
I tried talking myself out of it,
feeling this way, but...
...it's who I am.
Sorry, go ahead.
Or we could do this later. Up to you. You want to do it later?
translation.de: Oder später. Du entscheidest. Lieber später?

translation.en: [Sean Jr. sighs] No.
I wanted you to know that I'm...
translation.de: Ich wollte, dass ihr wisst, dass ich...

translation.en: I'm an atheist.
Oh, we love you no matter--
What?
He's an atheist. I thought he was gonna say...
translation.de: Er ist Atheist! Ich dachte, er wollte sagen...

translation.en: I'm having more water.
I was nervous to tell you 'cause you raised me all Catholic
translation.de: Ich war nervös. Ich wuchs katholisch auf. Ich dachte, ihr seid traurig.

translation.en: and I didn't want to upset you.
translation.de: Ich wuchs katholisch auf. Ich dachte, ihr seid traurig.

translation.en: Oh, we're not upset.
Right, Sean?
So, do I tell Poppy Don I'm not going to church on Christmas Eve, or should you?
translation.de: Sage ich Poppy Don, dass ich Heiligabend nicht in die Kirche gehe, oder ihr?

translation.en: How's that now?
I mean, obviously I'm not gonna go and just pretend to believe in God.
translation.de: Ich werde nicht so tun, als würde ich an Gott glauben.

translation.en: [laughs] Right. No. Obviously not.
Kayla, guess what I did to make you feel better.
translation.de: Kayla, rate, was ich für dich getan habe.

translation.en: Invented a time machine and undid all my life choices.
translation.de: Mit einer Zeitmaschine meine Entscheidungen revidiert?

translation.en: Almost. Um, yeah.
I, uh, dug up Mom's old Christmas cookie cutters, and...
translation.de: Ja. Ich kramte Moms alte Plätzchenformen hervor und...

translation.en: Ta-da!
They remind me of Mom.
-Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't think that-- -I still want them.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, ich... -Ich will sie trotzdem.

translation.en: Hey, um...
You don't need to keep trying to be Mom for her.
translation.de: Du musst nicht Mom für sie sein.

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
-Gonna keep trying to be Mom for her? -So much.
translation.de: -Wirst du es trotzdem tun? -So was von.

translation.en: This is going to look great.
I mean, that angel is...
angelic.
It goes on the roof.
Represents Emmy's mom, looking down on all of us.
translation.de: Er steht für Emmys Mom, die auf uns alle herabsieht.

translation.en: Yeah, we've had this house lighting tradition for years.
translation.de: Wir haben die Beleuchtungstradition seit Jahren.

translation.en: We let the grandkids flip on the lights. We sing carols, drink hot cider.
translation.de: Die Enkel machen die Lichter an. Es gibt Weihnachtslieder und Apfelwein.

translation.en: Oh, I love hot cider.
People are always coming up to me, like, "Hot chocolate rules."
translation.de: Die Leute sagen mir: "Ich steh auf Kakao."

translation.en: I'm like, "Get away, dude. No way.
I'm a cider guy. Hot cider for me, thanks."
translation.de: Ich steh auf Apfelwein. Apfelwein für mich, danke."

translation.en: We're gonna have hot chocolate, too.
Also really good.
Anyway...
I'm in love with your daughter, Mr. Quinn.
translation.de: Ich liebe Ihre Tochter, Mr. Quinn.

translation.en: And when a man loves a woman who...
translation.de: Und liebt ein Mann eine Frau, die...

translation.en: has a father...
traditionally...
Are you asking for my blessing to marry Emmy?
translation.de: Willst du meinen Segen, um Emmy zu heiraten?

translation.en: Yes, I-I was.
I am.
You are the first of my three daughters' suitors to have the guts to do this.
translation.de: Vor dir hatte kein Verehrer meiner drei Töchter den Mut dazu.

translation.en: I really appreciate it.
You are quite welcome. [chuckles]
Which makes it that much harder to say no.
translation.de: Das macht es schwerer, Nein zu sagen.

translation.en: You know, after this whole Alan thing, I just...
realized I got to be more careful about who I let into this family.
translation.de: merkte ich, dass ich bei Neuzugängen aufpassen muss.

translation.en: [sighs] But thanks for asking.
It means a lot.
Not enough, but a lot.
So he stomped on your hopes and dreams. Welcome to the club, buddy.
translation.de: Er zerstörte deine Hoffnungen und Träume. Willkommen im Club.

translation.en: I don't need his permission to ask, you know? I was just trying to be a gentleman.
translation.de: Ich brauche seine Erlaubnis gar nicht. Ich wollte bloß ein Gentleman sein.

translation.en: See, that's why I didn't ask for permission to marry Patsy.
translation.de: Darum hab ich's bei Patsy nicht getan.

translation.en: Lost his respect, but avoided his wrath. [chuckles] Wassup!
translation.de: Ich verlor seinen Respekt, aber mied seinen Zorn. Was geht?

translation.en: Like I said, hold off on asking Emmy to marry you on this trip.
translation.de: Wie gesagt, frag Emmy diesmal besser noch nicht.

translation.en: But Christmas is the perfect time.
You know what? He thinks he can intimidate me. But when I want something, I go for it.
translation.de: Er will mich einschüchtern. Aber wenn ich was will, ziehe ich's durch.

translation.en: I just need to prove to him that I'm good enough.
translation.de: Ich muss zeigen, dass ich gut genug bin.

translation.en: No. Not good enough.
Perfect.
-He's like a hurt baby duck. -Mm-hmm.
translation.de: Er ist wie eine verletzte Babyente.

translation.en: You want to help, but maybe it's best to let him waddle into the bushes -and die. -Oh.
translation.de: Man will helfen, aber er sollte in die Büsche watscheln und sterben.

translation.en: Still got it.
Oh, God.
Hey. Just wanted to check in, see if you needed any help.
translation.de: Hey. Ich wollte sehen, ob Sie Hilfe brauchen.

translation.en: I want to show you that I'm a, uh... a, uh...
a vessel of dependability.
A vessel of--
Are you high, rock star?
'Cause you know I can still bust you for that. This ain't LA.
translation.de: Dafür könnte ich dich einbuchten. Wir sind nicht in LA.

translation.en: Or Colorado. Or Maine, or Alaska, or...
translation.de: Oder Colorado. Oder Maine oder Alaska oder...

translation.en: Good Lord, it'd take less time to tell you the good states.
translation.de: Mann, die guten Bundesstaaten zu nennen, wär kürzer.

translation.en: Matt? What are you doing up there?
translation.de: Matt? Was machst du da oben?

translation.en: Just, uh, helping your dad with the lights.
translation.de: Deinem Dad mit den Lichtern helfen.

translation.en: Dad, do you want help?
[Don] Sure don't.
Matt, come on, we're making a fire. Come watch Elf with me and Kayla. [mouths] No!
translation.de: Matt, komm. Wir machen ein Feuer. Sieh dir Elf mit mir und Kayla an.

translation.en: [Emmy] My family's gonna be here in an hour.
translation.de: Die Familie kommt in einer Stunde. Lass Dad einfach machen.

translation.en: It's best to just let my dad do things his way. The Quinn way.
translation.de: Die Familie kommt in einer Stunde. Lass Dad einfach machen. -Auf Quinn-Weise. -Ich wusste nicht, wie spät es ist.

translation.en: [Don] Actually, I didn't know it was that late.
translation.de: -Auf Quinn-Weise. -Ich wusste nicht, wie spät es ist.

translation.en: I'm gonna need some help to finish in time.
translation.de: Ich brauche Hilfe, um es zu schaffen.

translation.en: Great. I'll stay.
I am here for you.
All right.
[grunting] On the roof.
Which is actually a lot higher than you'd think.
translation.de: Das ist viel schwerer, als man denkt.

translation.en: I got a bad feeling about this.
translation.de: Ich habe ein schlechtes Gefühl dabei.

translation.en: Hey, nice.
That's a line from Star Wars.
It's actually repeated in many of the, uh-- Oh, you don't care.
translation.de: Sie wird oft wiederholt... Ach, es ist Ihnen egal.

translation.en: You know, this is actually still a little crooked.
-Let me fix it real quick. -Hey.
-We still have a lot to do. -[Matt grunts]
translation.de: Wir haben noch viel zu tun.

translation.en: I hear you, Mr. Quinn. But as an artist,
translation.de: Ja, Mr. Quinn. Aber als Künstler

translation.en: -I have an eye for these things. -Hey, look!
I know you probably hate the term "artist."
No, no! Look! Look!
-Sorry. Sorry! -Don't stomp on her! That's my wife!
Wait.
Oh, my-- Oh, my God, it's sticking right in you.
translation.de: Oh Gott, es steckt in Ihnen drin.

translation.en: Oh, look at it. Look at it! Look!
I can't. It's in my forehead.
translation.de: Wie denn? Es steckt in meiner Stirn.

translation.en: You are definitely tougher than our nine-toed Santa.
translation.de: Du bist zäher als der Weihnachtsmann mit 9 Zehen.

translation.en: that's the nice part about getting shot early in my career, Nancy.
translation.de: Tja. Ein Vorteil, so früh in der Karriere angeschossen zu werden, Nancy.

translation.en: Any pain after that is just playing for second.
My son was ten pounds at birth.
translation.de: Mein Sohn wog 4,5 kg bei der Geburt.

translation.en: Every pain since, I'm like, "If it ain't a giant baby being yanked out of me, bring it."
translation.de: Danach war ich für jede Art von Schmerzen bestens gewappnet.

translation.en: [Don] This kid staples me in the head and he's the one who faints.
translation.de: Der Junge tackert mir in die Stirn, und er fällt in Ohnmacht.

translation.en: I can't believe this is the one my daughter brings home.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass den meine Tochter anschleppt.

translation.en: Look, Mr. Quinn. Don.
I know you're used to getting your way, but you--
translation.de: Ich weiß, Sie sind Ihre Art gewöhnt...

translation.en: Oh, my God. Is that sticking in your brain?!
translation.de: Oh Gott. Steckt das in Ihrem Hirn?

translation.en: Help me, help--
He's a bigger pain than a ten-pound baby.
You're such a hoot.
You're all alone on the holidays, too.
translation.de: Du bist auch allein über die Feiertage.

translation.en: Aunt Kayla's talking to a fish.
translation.de: Tante Kayla redet mit einem Fisch.

translation.en: It's been a long day, bud.
Where'd Sean Jr. go?
He's talking to my dad. I knew I shouldn't have brought him.
translation.de: Er redet mit Dad. Es war falsch, ihn mitzunehmen.

translation.en: You don't think he's gonna tell him he's an atheist when he's in the hospital, do you?
translation.de: Er sagt ihm doch nicht im Krankenhaus, dass er Atheist ist?

translation.en: I actually think we should be proud of Sean Jr. for not hiding who he is.
translation.de: Wir sollten stolz auf Sean Jr. sein, weil er dazu steht, wer er ist.

translation.en: Maybe everybody shouldn't have to tiptoe around your dad.
translation.de: Die Übervorsicht deinem Dad gegenüber ist übertrieben.

translation.en: Kayla's talking to a fish and she seems less crazy than you right now.
translation.de: Kayla redet mit Fischen und scheint weniger irre als du.

translation.en: I tried to be there for Kayla like Mom would've,
translation.de: Ich wollte für Kayla da sein wie Mom,

translation.en: but everything I did today just made her feel worse.
translation.de: aber ich habe alles nur schlimmer gemacht.

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not cut out for it.
Being a mom.
I know it's taking longer than we thought, but it's gonna happen.
translation.de: Es dauert länger als gedacht, aber das wird schon.

translation.en: Okay? And when it does,
translation.de: Ok? Und wenn es so weit ist,

translation.en: you're gonna be great.
Now Aunt Kayla's stealing the fish.
Our kid will be easier than her.
Hey, bud. I saw you talking to Poppy Don in there.
translation.de: Hey, Kumpel. Ich sah dich mit Poppy Don reden.

translation.en: That's fun.
I decided not to tell him.
[exhales] Oh, thank God.
We're good.
[laughing] Okay.
I'm gonna go put my face against some cold glass.
translation.de: Ich presse mal mein Gesicht gegen kaltes Glas.

translation.en: Sweetie, you know you don't have to be afraid to tell Poppy Don the truth, right?
translation.de: Schatz, du musst keine Angst haben, Poppy Don die Wahrheit zu sagen, ok?

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I went in there to tell him. Then I asked how he was doing.
translation.de: Ich wollte es sagen. Ich fragte ihn, wie es ihm geht.

translation.en: And he said he knew he'd be fine
translation.de: Er sagte, ihm ginge es gut,

translation.en: because Grammy Margaret was up in heaven watching over him
translation.de: weil Grammy Margaret im Himmel sei und auf ihn aufpasse.

translation.en: and all of us.
[sighs] I just couldn't do it to the guy.
translation.de: Ich konnte es ihm nicht antun.

translation.en: Well, I guess Dad's house lighting is canceled.
This is just...
The nurse is making me.
I see what you're trying to do.
Fighting for Emmy.
I'm just doing the same thing.
Hey, so we have loving Emmy in common.
translation.de: Wir haben gemeinsam, dass wir Emmy lieben.

translation.en: That's something, right?
In that it makes us opponents? Okay.
translation.de: Etwas, das uns zu Gegnern macht? Also gut.

translation.en: Did you finish your juice?
Yes.
No.
[sighs] When you're finished, you're clear to go.
You, on the other hand, your heart rate's a bit elevated.
translation.de: Allerdings ist dein Puls etwas erhöht.

translation.en: So I get to keep you a little longer.
[Don] Well...
guess there's worse things.
You, uh...
You like her.
Who? Nancy?
No.
[stammers] Uh, I like her as someone that I work with, but I don't like her like her. I mean...
translation.de: Ich mag sie als Kollegin, aber ich mag sie nicht als Frau.

translation.en: But even if I did, it's only been three years since my wife died.
translation.de: Selbst wenn, meine Frau ist erst drei Jahre tot.

translation.en: And, uh, again,
I don't like her.
And why am I explaining myself to you? Let's get you out of here.
translation.de: Warum rechtfertige ich mich? Bringen wir dich hier raus.

translation.en: Okay, Donny.
Hot cider for you, sir.
You couldn't be home for the lights, so I figured we bring the lights to you.
translation.de: Du verpasst die Lichter zu Hause, also holten wir sie zu dir.

translation.en: [exhales] This is something.
I bet Mom's looking down and smiling.
translation.de: Mom schaut jetzt zu und lächelt.

translation.en: You guys did all this for them?
translation.de: Ihr habt das alles für sie getan?

translation.en: Eh, this family's a pain in the butt, but they're our pain in the butt.
translation.de: Diese Familie nervt, aber es ist unsere Familie.

translation.en: -But yeah, they are a pain in the butt. -Such a pain in the butt. Yeah.
translation.de: -Aber ja, sie nervt. -Sie nervt extrem. Ja.

translation.en: -Sorry it's been so crazy. -[Matt sighs]
Oh, at least it's going by quick.
We've already been here, what? Three, four days?
translation.de: Wie lange sind wir hier? 3, 4 Tage?

translation.en: -Twelve hours. -Oh, God.
Oh, hi. [chuckles]
Look at you two. Matching bracelets.
-Bracelet buddies. -[Don laughs]
Don't ruin it.
Uh... you know what would make this perfect? If you'd just agree to meet with Ted Boseman.
translation.de: Weißt du, was perfekt wäre? Wenn du Ted Boseman triffst.

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Not to take a job, just to chat.
translation.de: -Oh Gott. -Nicht wegen des Jobs. Zum Plaudern.

translation.en: You know, as a favor to an old man who just got staple-gunned in the head.
translation.de: Als Gefallen für einen alten Mann, dessen Stirn getackert wurde.

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
Okay. Stop bugging me and I'll do it.
translation.de: Ok, hör auf zu nerven. Ich mach's.

translation.en: Wait.
So you are going to meet with that guy?
translation.de: Du triffst den Kerl also doch?

translation.en: Oh, just to get my dad off my back. Seriously, don't worry.
translation.de: Nur, damit mein Dad Ruhe gibt. Mach dir wirklich keine Sorgen.

translation.en: Worry. Seriously.
Don always gets his way.
-The Quinn way. -Definitely.
I wonder what would happen if we could somehow loosen Don up a bit.
translation.de: Was wäre, wenn wir Don dazu bringen, zu entspannen?

translation.en: I mean, that'd be good for all of us, right?
translation.de: Das wäre gut für uns alle, oder?

translation.en: The Quinns and Quinn-laws.
[scoffs] Quinn-laws.
Oh, that's good. He's good.
translation.de: Oh, das ist gut. Er ist gut.

translation.en: Emmy has agreed to meet with you.
Now, all you have to do is just make her a job offer that she can't refuse,
translation.de: Mach ihr einfach ein Jobangebot, das sie nicht ablehnen kann.

translation.en: and you will have paid me back for not arresting you for drunk and disorderly,
translation.de: Dann sind wir quitt, nachdem ich dich nicht wegen öffentlicher Trunkenheit

translation.en: and attempting to intoxicate a police horse.
translation.de: und Abfüllens eines Polizeipferds verknackt habe.

translation.en: Yeah.
That was a heck of a Thanksgiving night you had there, Ted.
translation.de: Das war echt eine heftige Thanksgiving-Nacht, Ted.
